00135 /************************** GLOBAL/PUBLIC MACRO DEFINITIONS *********************************/
00136 
00137 #ifdef  DEBUG
00138 /*******************************************************************************
00139 * @brief                The CHECK_PARAM macro is used for function's parameters check.
00140 *                               It is used only if the library is compiled in DEBUG mode.
00141 * @param[in]    expr - If expr is false, it calls check_failed() function
00142 *                       which reports the name of the source file and the source
00143 *                       line number of the call that failed.
00144 *                    - If expr is true, it returns no value.
00145 * @return               None
00146 *******************************************************************************/
00147 #define CHECK_PARAM(expr) ((expr) ? (void)0 : check_failed((uint8_t *)__FILE__, __LINE__))
00148 #else
00149 #define CHECK_PARAM(expr)
00150 #endif /* DEBUG */
00151 
00157 /* Public Functions ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00162 #ifdef  DEBUG
00163 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line);
00164 #endif
00165 
00170 #endif /* LPC17XX_LIBCFG_DEFAULT_H_ */
